name: Sombrio Cadence Liner Shorts - Women's
description: For long days in the saddlle. With a premium chamois, these liner shorts add extra comfort for epic days on the trail. They're super breathable and stretchy - just throw your favourite riding shorts overtop.High and wide waistband design reduces slippage during your ride.Ergonomic patterning combines two types of material for great breathability and mobility.Female-specific Formula chamois improves comfort in the saddle.Poron® foam technology provides excellent vibration dampening.Flat stitching reduces chaffing.Base layer fit.
